segments.text: Do you wash clothes here often ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have been coming here for the past few years .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's actually a lot cheaper for me to wash my clothes here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've only washed my clothes here a couple times .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why don't you wash clothes at home ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would , if my washing machine wasn't broken .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why don't you just get it fixed ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So you plan on washing your clothes here from now on ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's my only option right now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't worry . Besides , it's a lot cheaper to wash clothes this way .
segments.speaker: S2
